about.description:
WeasyPrint is a smart solution helping web developers to create PDF
documents. It turns simple HTML pages into gorgeous statistical
reports, invoices, tickets…
about.summary: WeasyPrint converts web documents (HTML with CSS, SVG, …) to PDF

name: weasyprint
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "WeasyPrint" %}
{% set version = "48" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://github.com/Kozea/{{ name }}/archive/v{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 164981f6211fccdc4e727f7816513d304ba73e1de2641f476d472002e6db678b

build:
  number: 0
  skip: true  # [win]
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv"

requirements:
  host:
    - python >3.5
    - pip
    - pango
    - setuptools >=39.2.0
    - cffi >=0.6
    - html5lib >=0.999999999
    - cairocffi >=0.9.0
    - tinycss2 >=1.0.0
    - cssselect2 >=0.1
    - cairosvg >=2.4.0
    - pyphen >=0.8
    - pytest-runner
    - xorg-libxrender
    - xorg-libxext
    
  run:
    - python >3.5
    - pango
    - setuptools >=39.2.0
    - cffi >=0.6
    - html5lib >=0.999999999
    - cairocffi >=0.9.0
    - tinycss2 >=1.0.0
    - cssselect2 >=0.1
    - cairosvg >=2.4.0
    - pyphen >=0.8
    - xorg-libxrender
    - xorg-libxext

test:
  imports:
    - weasyprint

about:
  home: https://github.com/Kozea/WeasyPrint
  license: BSD-3-Clause
  license_family: BSD
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: 'WeasyPrint converts web documents (HTML with CSS, SVG, …) to PDF'

  description: |
    WeasyPrint is a smart solution helping web developers to create PDF
    documents. It turns simple HTML pages into gorgeous statistical
    reports, invoices, tickets…

  doc_url: https://weasyprint.readthedocs.io/en/stable/
  dev_url: https://github.com/Kozea/WeasyPrint

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - mrandrewandrade
    - liZe
